thread.section_title: Regent Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel With Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Hotel With Great Location - Review of Regent Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: A M
title: Great Hotel With Great Location
text: I travel extensively in China and stay at the Regent whenever I get a chance. The hotel is in the center of Beijing with easy walking access to all major tourist areas, restaurants and shopping. The hotel is very well managed with guests attended to promptly and professionally at all times (with a smile!). In fact the staff go the extra mile when taking care of a request or a problem. It is worth staying in an executive room as the executive lounge is excellent serving a great breakfast in the morning and coffee, tea, etc throughout the day with great views of the city. The hotel also has a Morton's steak restaurant which serves one of the best steaks in Beijing. It is expensive, however so worth it.
